title: Series 2016 Gave Away Pax TF?

embed.description: THESE CODES ARE NEW PAX TWISTED FATE, WORKING IN 2016 TILL MAY 2017 . Codes work on:NA/EUNE/EUW/BR/RU/TR/OCE. It will work on any type of account. | eBay!

body: Hi guys, I am a super fan of TF, and I saw this product a few days ago on Ebay. As for me, I cannot identify if it is real or not. I have done the research about this event, nothing comes up. Please help me out if you know anything about this event or this product. Thank you

replies.body:
Yeesh, it's unfortunate to see cases where someone is trying to ruse an unsuspecting player.  I've forwarded this to interested parties to look into, but yeah this is not legit.  That sale is suggesting skin that is [limited](https://www.google.com/search?q=Limited+skins&rlz=1C1NHXL_enUS727US727&oq=Limited+skins&aqs=chrome..69i57.3012j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8), and no longer available.  Meaning, they do not make a return during any special event or store.  

Further, old codes also expired back in April 2014 and were no longer unlockable per our [code cards FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202801810-Code-Cards-FAQ).  

> 
> Note: While some websites or individuals sell Riot code cards on the Internet, they are almost always doing so with fraudulent intent (i.e. those codes are usually redeemed, expired or stolen). As we do not support 3rd party re-sellers, please avoid buying stuff from Internet Strangers! We will not be able to help you if your 3rd party code does not work for any reason.


Let me know if that clears things up!
At one point they deactivatet all the old Codes to prevent skinshops from 3rd Partys if I remember correctly. So yeah probably scam
That is exactly what I think, but not sure if Riot would give away maybe a few codes at some special events. That seller seems legit while fake. xD
they dont give away old event skins like pax skins. they were given out at those events and those events only
